triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the challenge of factual incorrectness and hallucination in state-of-the-art dialogue models.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on reducing the well-known problem of knowledge hallucination in conversational AI systems.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: The paper builds upon techniques from open-domain QA, which are adapted for the more challenging knowledge-grounded dialogue task.

triples.name: Information retrieval
triples.relevance: The paper employs neural-retrieval-in-the-loop architectures to retrieve relevant knowledge to ground dialogue responses.

triples.name: Autoencoder
triples.relevance: The paper uses encoder-decoder architectures as core components in the dialogue models.

triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: The paper proposes neural-retrieval-in-the-loop architectures which implement retrieval-augmented generation for knowledge-grounded dialogue.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the challenge of reducing hallucination in state-of-the-art chatbots through retrieval-augmented architectures.
